scripts.prepublish: echo BUILDING CLIENT && npm run build:main && npm run build:analysisui && npm run build:resultsview && npm run build:coms && echo DONE && npm run beep
scripts.build:main: browserify --debug main/main.js        --outfile main.js        && lessc main/main.less        main.css
scripts.build:analysisui: browserify --debug analysisui/main.js  --outfile analysisui.js  && lessc analysisui/main.less  analysisui.css
scripts.build:resultsview: browserify --debug resultsview/main.js --outfile resultsview.js && lessc resultsview/main.less resultsview.css
scripts.watch: npm run prepublish && onchange main/* analysisui/* resultsview/* common/* -- npm run prepublish
scripts.build:main:release: browserify -t uglifyify main/main.js --outfile main.js && lessc main/main.less main.css
scripts.build:analysisui:release: browserify -t uglifyify analysisui/main.js --outfile analysisui.js  && lessc analysisui/main.less  analysisui.css
scripts.build:resultsview:release: browserify -t uglifyify resultsview/main.js --outfile resultsview.js && lessc resultsview/main.less resultsview.css
scripts.build:release: npm run build:main:release && npm run build:analysisui:release && npm run build:resultsview:release && npm run build:coms && bash release.sh
